extendedInfo.description: Endomondo is one of the highest rated app of its kind on Android and ideal for running, cycling, walking and any other distance-based activity. Join 18 million users and start freeing your endorphins!Please see What's New on Google Play for latest changes.PRO features:* Interval programs: Choose from three programs or create your own and let the audio coach guide you* Graphs: View graphs with your lap times, heart rate, speed and altitude throughout the workout * Beat yourself: Set a previous workout as your goal and the audio coach will help you perform better this time* Low power mode: Increase the battery standby time by using this feature for long workouts* Pedometer: Use the step counter feature to track workouts when you don't have GPS coverage, e.g., indoor (NEW)* Customized Audio Coach: Customize how often you get audio feedback and what information is read aloud to you (NEW)* Time goal: Choose a duration for your workout and the audio coach will help you reach the time goal* Calorie goal: Set a calorie goal for your workout and the audio coach will guide youFREE features:* Track any outdoor sport including duration, distance, speed and calories* Enter a workout manually, e.g., a treadmill run or weight training* Get audio feedback for every mile or km while exercising  * Get live peptalks from friends - they write a short text on our website which is then read out loud to you seconds later   * See your route on a map  * Track your heart rate (works with Polar WearlinkÂ® + transmitter with BluetoothÂ® and Zephyr heart rate monitor, more info at store.endomondo.com)* View history of workouts and study split times per km or mile  * Set a distance goal and have the audio coach speak to that as your target* Sync workouts across multiple platforms (web entry, certain watches, file import - signup required)* Share workouts on Facebook Timeline* See your friends' latest workouts in real-time* Race against a friendâs time and have the audio coach help you perform better * Compete on a specific route nearby and race against the route champion* Follow your friends' latest activities with the social widget on your phone's home screen* Keep a log of your music playlist for each workout* Study routes nearby and use the map to navigate your way around* Set the app to pause automatically when you are not moving* Enable countdown* Customize the main screen to show the information that you find most valuable* Get instant feedback by tapping your (wired) headsetâs media button * Pause and resume a workout by long pressing your (wired) headset's media button* Integrate with bike speed & cadence and heart rate monitor sensors using ANT+* Integrate with SonyEricsson's SmartWatch as a SmartExtra* Access all your online settings: Profile, sharing, privacy, workout, audio & accessories* See how much you need to drink during and after your workout to stay hydrated and perform at your best* Heart rate zones in workout summary (Premium/subscription feature)* Weather info in workout summary (Premium/subscription feature)If you sign up, all data is sent automatically to your personal training diary and the social fitness network at www.endomondo.com. This is the place to analyze your training, compete against your friends, follow others live and communicate with active people throughout the world, no matter what GPS phone or tracking device they are using. Time to free your endorphins!NOTE: We are asking for permissions to access your personal information and read contacts. We ask for this to make you able to connect with your friends, challenge them and follow them directly on your phone. We will read names and email addresses from your contacts ONLY if you actively choose to do so within the app.

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Map is fairly accurate, but lacks the detail of Runkeeper. Easy to use and navigate. It is supposed to share with my fitbit app but I have been unsuccessful so far. The mile/pace announcer is tolerable.  The share to Facebook option after each run is annoying!  I dont have a freaking FB account!!!
reviews.author: Kamel Camel

reviews.title: Fix update to sync with other apps
reviews.comment: everything was working fine until the Sep 3 update. now all my activities do not sync with Facebook or MyFitnessPal. can you please test your updates before releasing them. I have checked permissions on all apps, uninstalled/reinstalled Endomondo Pro but sync will not happen.
reviews.author: Junjie Noguera

reviews.title: Nexus7 is a TABLET
reviews.comment: Precious update was good. The latest thinks my nexus7 is a freaking PHONE. wtf ? No i will not go running carrying my tablet as logging device.  Seriously...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Latest update knocked out gps tracking
reviews.comment: Having paid for this app,  am disappointed with the latest version.  And the continual reminders for subscription services.  Going to un install and move on to another app.
reviews.author: Colin Harrison-Haynes

reviews.title: GPS failure
reviews.comment: Since the latest update the app never finds GPS, even when left outside for 20 minutes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cuts corners
reviews.comment: The basic functions are fine, but the route logged cuts so much corners that distances measured are way off. Wish there was an option to snap the location to closest road,  or at least increase the gps polling frequency.
reviews.author: Anders Candell

reviews.title: Not worth the $$
reviews.comment: This app is not at all worth the 4.99. Everything this app records many other fitness apps record the same stats for FREE!! Don\'t waste your money!
reviews.author: Wendi Cash

reviews.title: Almost...
reviews.comment: Would really like to be able to add my heart rate info in a manual entry akin to the full website\'s functionality. By not having this in the app, my numbers are skewed when entering data via the app vs. the website. Please fix in future update.
reviews.author: Jonathan Collins

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work after last update
reviews.comment: I can\'t sign in with email anymore. \"Network error....\". With Google + it works. I am wondering if this is a way to force users to share info from Google or FB. Sad.
reviews.author: Cristian Popescu

reviews.title: Will change rating if and when  I can actually use the ap
reviews.comment: All of a sudden I cannot log in. Therefore I can\'t use the ap. I am trying to get back into exercising and it is frustrating to not be able to log in. :(
reviews.author: Kathy Moore

reviews.title: Reasonable
reviews.comment: The main thing this app lacks is a way to overrule the data on the server if the upload failed. They assume the user is wrong (or malicious?) and they are right, which is usually false and not the way to build user-oriented apps. Otherwise useful, easy and fun.
reviews.author: Marius \'t Hart

reviews.title: Pretty good, but...
reviews.comment: Have to dock one star for inane developer reluctance to bring out the app for non GPS tablets,  and one one star less for not including cycling in the training program feature. Major oversight, as this, along with running, is the most popular activity!
reviews.author: Jose Cordero

reviews.title: Not great but very good.
reviews.comment: Works well and tracks workouts fine but could do with more customisable data being displayed after yo ur run or ride. I must say though that I really dislike trying to be milked for more money on the workout plans even after upgrading, it just screams desperation...
reviews.author: Alex Maiorano

reviews.title: Went back to free version
reviews.comment: After using the free version for 500+ miles of running, I downloaded the Pro version earlier this week, but in my 3 attempts to use it, it has stopped tracking my run 2x and locked up my phone (an S3) the third time.  Went back to free version and was able to finish my run today w/o any further problems.  Hopefully they can get the problems resolved.  Like screen layout, mobile features much more than Runkeeper and MapmyRun, website route mapping much better, too.  Will update to give 5 stars if they get the bugs worked out.
reviews.author: Tim Dodge

reviews.title: Great app, little buggy with GPS
reviews.comment: Love this App. keeps very good tracking of my workout. However, i find it to be buggy in case GPS signal is lost and then restored [ the App found out a ran 9 miles in 5 minutes]  because of this GPS bug.. i hope they will fix that
reviews.author: Haitham Taleb

reviews.title: Fantastic update
reviews.comment: I use this for most outdoor exercise activities.
reviews.author: Ronnie Roybal

reviews.title: Do not bother
reviews.comment: A wast of 3.99. It is just the same as yhe free version and now I have it, they want more money off me to make it ever better. Its just a con
reviews.author: stephen holliss
